rules_text: Target opponent exiles 5 nonland cards from their sideboard, Then exile a card from your sideboard if fewer than 5 were exiled this way. You may cast a copy of any number of cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
notes:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/B2em


Alt_1:
Target opponent exiles up to 5 nonland cards from their sideboard, Then exile a card from your sideboard if fewer than 5 were exiled this way. You may cast cards exiled this way without paying their mana cost for as long as they remain exiled.

OG_1:
Target opponent exiles 5 nonland cards from their sideboard, Then exile a card from your sideboard if fewer than 5 were exiled this way. You may cast a copy of any number of cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
